mapper.select: select b.name as role, b.id as roleId from sys_user_role_relation a inner join sys_role b on a.role_id = b.id where a.user_id = #{id}
select c.name as name, c.sort as sort, c.id as id from sys_role a inner join sys_role_menu b on a.id = b.role_id inner join sys_menu c on b.menu_id = c.id where a.id = #{id} and b.del_flag = 0
select count(0) from sys_user a left join sys_user_role_relation b on a.id = b.user_id left join sys_role c on b.role_id = c.id where c.name = #{name}

select a.id as userId, a.amount as amount, sum(b.amount) as rechargeTotal, sum(c.amount) as incomeTotal, a.login_way as loginWay, a.del_flag as delFlag from sys_user a left join recharge_detail b on a.id = b.create_by left join lottery_detail c on a.id = c.create_by where 1 = 1
and a.id = #{request.userId}
and a.account = #{request.account}
and a.phone = #{request.phone}
and date_format(a.create_date, '%Y-%m-%d') >= date_format(#{request.beginDate}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and date_format(a.create_date, '%Y-%m-%d') <= date_format(#{request.endDate}, '%Y-%m-%d')
order by a.amount
order by a.amount desc
order by rechargeTotal
order by rechargeTotal desc
order by incomeTotal
order by incomeTotal desc

select b.id as id, b.amount as amount, a.amount as winningAmount, b.create_date as createDate, a.create_date as lotteryAmount from lottery_detail a inner join grab_red_packets b on a.grab_red_packets_id = b.id where b.create_by = #{request.userId}

select a.phone, b.ip, a.account, b.create_date from sys_user a left join (select ip, create_by, create_date from sys_login_detail order by create_date desc limit 1) b on a.id = b.create_by where a.id = #{id}
